lead_paragraph: Craig Hartsburg, who previously coached Anaheim and Chicago, was named the coach of the Ottawa Senators. Hartsburg has been coach of the Ontario Hockey League’s Sault Ste. Marie Greyhounds for the past four seasons.
snippet: Craig Hartsburg, who previously coached Anaheim and Chicago, was named the coach of the Ottawa Senators. Hartsburg has been coach of the Ontario Hockey League’s Sault Ste. Marie Greyhounds for the past four seasons.
